text: (napiye!) Nir ketpiraka"allah tan atiyarkalukkaka velippatuttiyulla (atai) alakaiyum, unavu vakaikalil tuymaiyanavarraiyum tatuttatu yar?" Innum kurum; "avai ivvulaka valkkaiyil nampikkaiyalarkalukku (anumatikkappattavaiye, eninum marumaiyil) avarkalukku mattume contamanavaiyakavum irukkum" ivvaru nam nam vacanankalai ariyakkutiya makkalukku vivarikkinrom
